text:
Kareena Kapoor Khan and Saif Ali Khan might not be big fans of PDA but whenever this royal couple makes an appearance, they manage to turn heads. Both Saif and Kareena are supportive of each other and we have seen several instances when they have come out to extend their love.
Viral Bhayani
This Friday is an important day for Saif Ali Khan, whose film Bazaar is all set to hit the theatres. The screening of the film was held at a Mumbai theatre last night where we saw Bebo supporting her husband in the sweetest way possible. yes, she attended the screening too.
While Saif was seen in a white kurta with a pink blazer, Kareena looked stunning in a black top and white trousers.
Viral Bhayani

title: Kareena Kapoor Khan Extends Support To Husband Saif Ali Khan, Attends The Screening Of 'Bazaar'
description: Kareena Kapoor Khan and Saif Ali Khan might not be PDA fans but whenever this royal couple makes an appearance, they manage to turn heads. Both Saif and Kareena are supportive of each other and we have seen several instances when they have come out to extend support.
